Funder guidelines:  

Specifically, comment on how your research will have a tangible, positive effect on: 

* New Zealand’s economy, in terms of international trade and business development in key sectors, OR
* New Zealand’s population in terms of health and safety, OR
* Research and scholarship in the above two areas

Please also comment on:

 - How innovative your research is
 - The extent to which your research will attract international interest 
 - The extent to which your research encourages international academic relationships and collaborations
